name: Choices, The Game
description: Choices, The Game is a multiple choice, point and click, choose-your-own adventure game. The game has two lines of text at the top, one being the narrator and the bottom being what is happening in the scene you're in. At the bottom there's ten colored buttons with actions to choose from. Depending on your actions the story drastically changes. Between the text at the top and the ten buttons to choose from there's an image showing what's going on around you.
